title: Mystic Wood AoSol skin concept
body:
https://imgur.com/D6jcoG2
https://imgur.com/wwQ2FeO
Hey there! I've been working on theese skin concepts lately. Let me know what do you think! {{champion:136}}

I'm planning to make a splash-art for one of theese, so it would be nice to know which one is the best looking ^^

replies.body: Looks better than mecha Asol
Thank you so much!
No problem, I play Asol mid lane, when I saw the new skin's teaser, was horrified at how bad the art was.

I'm not a fan either, they had so many other skin lines to choose from...

* Abyss Aurelion Sol
* Dark Star Aurelion Sol
* Elderwood Aurelion Sol
* Eternum Aurelion Sol
* Lunar Emperor Aurelion Sol
* Candy King Aurelion Sol
* Arclight Aurelion Sol
* Arcade Aurelion Sol
* Hextech Aurelion Sol

Mecha would of been alright in concept but the overall skin visuals ended up looking like the rayquaza pokemon (something everyone has been saying).
Yeah I'm not a big fan of this new skin either, especially that they removed his back legs..with chroma it looks much better but still,it could be much better :/
I hated it at first too, but someone used it in game and I actually like it now. The chromas make it much better as well! But still, there was so much potential wasted.

> [{quoted}](name=BurakkuRozu9,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UhbExZkK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-08-22T05:23:16.966+0000)
>
> Looks better than mecha Asol

Anything looks better than a mess of polygons slaped together

> [{quoted}](name=BurakkuRozu9,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UhbExZkK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-08-22T05:23:16.966+0000)
>
> Looks better than mecha Asol

anything looks better than mecha Asol, there were so many concepts out there and it just had to be mecha lmao
cmon dude my wallet is hurting enough as is
make his horn pattern different its too close to his base and put a splash of more colors and detail in it
Got it, I'll just try to do that, thanks for the critism! :)
i love the concept tho, i cant wait to get my tablet so i can do digital art and post my ideas as well

Is this Busty Demoness's alternate account?

Or are you Bi Sex Plant? 

Or neither? 

Irregardless nice concept
Nope neither of theese, the only thing is that my name was Djarumviki back then. ^^ Thank you :)

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}} 

Give me a few days... my brain is melting with this in it's memory locker...
Looks really good, I like the one you made the in-game art with the best
Great skin for 2023

God, i would LOVE an elderwood skin for Aurelion! These are amazing!

I think 2 and 3 are the best. But all of them look so nice~

This is so awesome, GJ! you did a very nice job!
Looks amazing, keep up!{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
Why didnt we get this instead of meh-ca PepeHands
